A C D F G I J O P R S T 

A

adjustment - Variable in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Parameter used to adjust extreme scores (e.g., perfect failures/successes) This value defaults to 0.3 if no user-specified value is passed to the Stata program that calls this Java program.

C

centeritems - Variable in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Sets a boolean in the estimation algorithm to center the item parameters.

D

diff - Variable in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
A double array of estimated difficulty parameter values.
diffSE - Variable in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
An array of standard errors of the difficulty parameter estimates from the JMLE values obtained from fitting the Rasch model to the data.

F

fitModel() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
A method to fit the model to the data; This method also sets some of the variables of the class.

getIRM() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Getter method for the array of Item Response Models.
getItemInfit() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to access the estimated item-level infit statistics The item infit (or the Information Weighted Mean Square error) is defined as : \(v_i = \sum_{j}^{J}W_{ij}z_{ij}^{2} / \sum_{j}^{J}W_{ij} \) Where \(W_{ij}\) is the variance of the ith person and jth item: \(W_{ij} = \sum_{k = 0}^{m_{i}}(k - \varepsilon_{ij})^{2}\pi_{ijk}\) and \(z_{ij}\) is the residual on the jth item for the ith subject.
getItemInfit(int) - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to access the estimated item infit statistic for the jth item
getItemOutfit() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to access the estimated item-level outfit statistics The item outfit (or the Unweighted Mean Square error) is defined as: \(u_{i} = \sum_{n = 1}^{N}z_{ij}^{2} / N \) Where \(z_{ij}^{2}\) is the squared residual for the ith subject responding to the jth item and N is the number of subjects.
getItemOutfit(int) - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to access the estimated item outfit statistic for the jth item
getItemStdInfit() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to access the estimated standardized item infit statistics
getItemStdInfit(int) - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to access the estimated standardized item infit statistic for the jth item
getItemStdOutfit() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to access the estimated standardized item outfit statistics
getItemStdOutfit(int) - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to access the estimated standardized item outfit statistic for the jth item
getMetaOb() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE

The maximum likelihood convergence criteria for the estimation of person parameter theta.

personStandardErrors - Variable in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE

R

rasch(String[]) - Static method in class org.paces.Stata.IRT
Method to fit the JMLE estimator to the data in memory in Stata

Constructor method for class
residuals - Variable in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Estimated residual error from individual item responses
returnItemParameters() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method that returns item fit statistics to Stata This method sets the item fit statistics as Stata scalars which will be further processed by the .ado file to provide better return objects.
returnPersonParameters() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to return Person fit statistics to Stata This method adds six new variables to the dataset: theta, csem, outfit, infit, stdoutfit, and stdinfit.
returnResiduals() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method returns residuals as a set of scalars which will need to be further processed by Stata in order to construct the matrix of residuals.

S

scale - Variable in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Parameter used for DefaultLinearTransformation Documentation from com.itemanalysis.psychometrics not clear.
setAdjustment() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method to set adjustment factor for extreme scores If no user-specified value is passed, the method sets this parameter to a default value of 0.3.
setCenterItems() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
A Setter method for the estimation parameter to center the estimated item parameters When true, items are centered at \(\mu_{\alpha}\) to aid in the identification of the model; this is the standard practice for Rasch modeling.
setGlobalConvergence() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
A setter method to set the Global Convergence criteria variable/parameter If no value is passed, the default of 0.001 is used.
setGlobalIterations() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
A setter method to set the Global Iterations variable/parameter If no value is passed the default value of 5,000 is used.
setIntercept() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Setter method for the intercept member variable Used to scale parameter estiamtes/score estimates.
setIRM() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Setter method for the Item Response Model array used by the JointMaximumLikelihoodEstimator class object from the com.itemanalysis .psychometrics package.
setItemFitStatistics() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method used to set all Item Fit Statistics This method is used to set item level outfit, infit, standardized outfit, and standardized infit values after JMLE estimation of a Rasch IRT model.
setJmle() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Setter method for the JointMaximumLikelihoodEstimator class variable
setMeta(String[]) - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Setter method to create Meta object for class
setPersonConvergence() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
A setter method to set the Person Convergence criteria variable/parameter If the user does not supply a value, the default 0.001 is used.
setPersonFitStatistics() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
Method used to set all Person Fit Statistics This method is used to set person outfit, infit, standardized outfit, and standardized infit values after JMLE estimation of a Rasch IRT model.
setPersonIterations() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
A setter method to set the Person Iterations variable/parameter If no value is passed, the default of 5,000 is used.
setPrecision() - Method in class org.paces.Stata.RaschJMLE
